feature_model.name: WB2
feature_model.feature_tree: :r WB2 (f_WB2) :o Feature-4 (f_Feature_4) :o Feature-13 (f_Feature_13) :o Feature-1 (f_Feature_1) :g [1, *] : Feature-8 (f_Feature_8) : Feature-6 (f_Feature_6) : Feature-7 (f_Feature_7) :o Feature-2 (f_Feature_2) :o Feature-3 (f_Feature_3) :g [1, *] : Feature-10 (f_Feature_10) : Feature-11 (f_Feature_11) : Feature-12 (f_Feature_12)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_Feature_10 or f_Feature_4 constraint_2:~f_Feature_10 or f_WB2 constraint_3:~f_Feature_11 or f_Feature_4 constraint_4:~f_Feature_11 or f_WB2 constraint_5:~f_Feature_6 or f_Feature_2 constraint_6:~f_Feature_7 or f_Feature_2
